title: Jimmy Butler Trade Talks and Media Day Takeaways | The Ringer NBA Show (Ep. 312)
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Vernon and Kevin O’Connor explore the discussion around the Minnesota Timberwolves looking to trade away Jimmy Butler (0:52) and react to the highlights of an eventful media day (28:32).
We are now on Twitter! Follow us at @RingerNBA.

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
